verses.verse: Then <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> out of the <S%H1710>fish<s%>'s <S%H4578>belly<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I <S%H7121>called<s%> by reason of mine <S%H6869>affliction<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, And he <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H990>me<s%>; Out of the belly of <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> <S%H7768>cried<s%> <S%H8085>I<s%>, And thou heardest my <S%H6963>voice<s%>.

For thou didst <S%H7993>cast<s%> me into the <S%H4688>depth<s%>, in the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas<s%>, And the <S%H5104>flood<s%> was <S%H5437>round<s%> about <S%H1530>me<s%>; All thy waves and thy <S%H4867>billows<s%> passed over <S%H5674>me<s%>.
And I <S%H559>said<s%>, I am cast <S%H1644>out<s%> from before thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>; Yet I will <S%H5027>look<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> toward thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple<s%>.

The <S%H4325>waters<s%> compassed me <S%H661>about<s%>, even to the <S%H5315>soul<s%>; The <S%H8415>deep<s%> was round <S%H5437>about<s%> <S%H5488>me<s%>; The weeds were wrapped <S%H2280>about<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%>.

I went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7095>bottoms<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>; The <S%H776>earth<s%> with its <S%H1280>bars<s%> closed upon me for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: Yet hast thou brought <S%H5927>up<s%> my <S%H2416>life<s%> from the <S%H7845>pit<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>.

When my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H5848>fainted<s%> within <S%H2142>me<s%>, I remembered <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; And my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> unto <S%H6944>thee<s%>, into thy holy <S%H1964>temple<s%>.

But I will <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto thee with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%>; I will <S%H7999>pay<s%> that which I have <S%H5087>vowed<s%>. <S%H3444>Salvation<s%> is of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto the <S%H1709>fish<s%>, and it vomited <S%H6958>out<s%> <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> upon the dry <S%H3004>land<s%>.
